mapper.select: select c.id,c.content,c.user_id,c.pictures_id,c.create_time,c.update_time,c.parent_comment_id,c.is_admin, c.parent_comment_id,c.comment_nick_name,c.liked,c.liked_user, u.nick_name user_nick_name,u.id user_id,u.avator user_avator, u_d.grade user_dask_grade from `comment` c join user u on u.id = c.user_id join user_dask u_d on u_d.user_id = u.id join pictures p on p.id = c.pictures_id where p.id = #{picturesId} order by c.create_time desc;
